1.name: Interstellar
1.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

2.name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
2.description: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

3.name: What We Do in the Shadows
3.description: Viago, Deacon and Vladislav are vampires who are finding that modern life has them struggling with the mundane - like paying rent, keeping up with the chore wheel, trying to get into nightclubs and overcoming flatmate conflicts.

4.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
4.description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

5.name: Gone Girl
5.description: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

6.name: Maleficent
6.description: A vengeful fairy is driven to curse an infant princess, only to discover that the child may be the one person who can restore peace to their troubled land.

7.name: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
7.description: A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production.

8.name: Whiplash
8.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

9.name: Kingsman: The Secret Service
9.description: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

10.name: Blended
10.description: After a bad blind date, a man and woman find themselves stuck together at a resort for families, where their attraction grows as their respective kids benefit from the burgeoning relationship.

11.name: Fury
11.description: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

12.name: John Wick
12.description: An ex-hit-man comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog and took everything from him.

13.name: Ex Machina
13.description: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

14.name: Unbroken
14.description: After a near-fatal plane crash in WWII, Olympian Louis Zamperini spends a harrowing 47 days in a raft with two fellow crewmen before he's caught by the Japanese navy and sent to a prisoner-of-war camp.

15.name: Lucy
15.description: A woman, accidentally caught in a dark deal, turns the tables on her captors and transforms into a merciless warrior evolved beyond human logic.

16.name: Turist
16.description: A family vacationing in the French Alps is confronted with a devastating avalanche.

17.name: Edge of Tomorrow
17.description: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.

18.name: Nightcrawler
18.description: When Louis Bloom, a con man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.

19.name: The Imitation Game
19.description: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians.

20.name: Inherent Vice
20.description: In 1970, drug-fueled Los Angeles private investigator Larry "Doc" Sportello investigates the disappearance of a former girlfriend.

21.name: Divergent
21.description: In a world divided by factions based on virtues, Tris learns she's Divergent and won't fit in. When she discovers a plot to destroy Divergents, Tris and the mysterious Four must find out what makes Divergents dangerous before it's too late.

22.name: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
22.description: Bilbo and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.

23.name: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
23.description: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

24.name: In-gan-jung-dok
24.description: In the summer of 1969, Colonel Kim Jin Pyeong returns to South Korea after serving in Vietnam. He is suffering from post-traumatic disorder and trapped in a loveless marriage with Soo Jin, ...                See full summary »

25.name: Tusk
25.description: A brash and arrogant podcaster gets more than he bargained for when he travels to Canada to interview a mysterious recluse... who has a rather disturbing fondness for walruses.

26.name: American Sniper
26.description: Navy S.E.A.L. sniper Chris Kyle's (Bradley Cooper's) pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives on the battlefield and turns him into a legend. Back home to his wife and kids after four tours of duty, however, Chris finds that it is the war he can't leave behind.

27.name: Wild
27.description: A chronicle of one woman's one thousand one hundred mile solo hike undertaken as a way to recover from a recent personal tragedy.

28.name: The Theory of Everything
28.description: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

29.name: Love, Rosie
29.description: Rosie and Alex have been best friends since they were 5, so they couldn't possibly be right for one another...or could they? When it comes to love, life and making the right choices, these two are their own worst enemies.

30.name: Cake
30.description: The acerbic, hilarious Claire Bennett becomes fascinated by the suicide of a woman in her chronic pain support group. As she uncovers the details of Nina's suicide and develops a poignant relationship with Nina's husband, she also grapples with her own, very raw personal tragedy.

31.name: Godzilla
31.description: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

32.name: Transformers: Age of Extinction
32.description: When humanity allies with a bounty hunter in pursuit of Optimus Prime, the Autobots turn to a mechanic and his family for help.

33.name: The Equalizer
33.description: A man believes he has put his mysterious past behind him and has dedicated himself to beginning a new, quiet life, before he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters and can't stand idly by.

34.name: X-Men: Days of Future Past
34.description: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

35.name: The Falling
35.description: It's 1969 at a strict English girls' school where charismatic Abbie and intense and troubled Lydia are best friends. After a tragedy occurs at the school, a mysterious fainting epidemic breaks out threatening the stability of all involved.

36.name: Chef
36.description: A head chef quits his restaurant job and buys a food truck in an effort to reclaim his creative promise, while piecing back together his estranged family.

37.name: The Fault in Our Stars
37.description: Two teenage cancer patients begin a life-affirming journey to visit a reclusive author in Amsterdam.

38.name: Big Hero 6
38.description: The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

39.name: While We're Young
39.description: A middle-aged couple's career and marriage are overturned when a disarming young couple enters their lives.

40.name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
40.description: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

41.name: The Other Woman
41.description: After discovering her boyfriend is married, Carly soon meets the wife he's been betraying. And when yet another love affair is discovered, all three women team up to plot revenge on the three-timing S.O.B.

42.name: The Maze Runner
42.description: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they're all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow "runners" for a shot at escape.

43.name: The Babadook
43.description: A single mother and her child fall into a deep well of paranoia when an eerie children's book titled "Mister Babadook" manifests in their home.

44.name: It Follows
44.description: A young woman is followed by an unknown supernatural force after a sexual encounter.

45.name: Predestination
45.description: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

46.name: Hercules
46.description: Having endured his legendary twelve labors, Hercules, the Greek demigod, has his life as a sword-for-hire tested when the King of Thrace and his daughter seek his aid in defeating a tyrannical warlord.

47.name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
47.description: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

48.name: The Best of Me
48.description: A pair of former high school sweethearts reunite after many years when they return to visit their small hometown.

49.name: 300: Rise of an Empire
49.description: Greek general Themistokles leads the charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

50.name: Boyhood
50.description: The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.
